rows: For this example, set it to "#f3f3f3."

How to group the row content horizontally. Point to the area between the columns and drag left or right to change the column proportions. For this example, ClickAdd newtwice and set column structure to "2" - "7" - "3."
html:
Parameter

Parameter value

Row background color

For this example, set it to "#f3f3f3."

Columns structure

How to group the row content horizontally. Point to the area between the columns and drag left or right to change the column proportions. For this example, Click Add new twice and set column structure to "2" - "7" - "3."
